item.title: Who's Shaz?
item.description: Hi! My name is Shaz and I’ll be using this blog for pretty much anything that I feel that is worth sharing. My aim is to share anything that I learn with others, so that you may benefit from it as well. ðŸ˜„ I have a pet turtle called Tello and I’m often found playing my Nintendo Switch - if you have a game you think I should know about, message me.
